Fetch physiological data

physiologies.Rd

Fetch physiological data

physiologies(keyword = "all")

Arguments

keyword

a character vector of physiologies desired (see curationLinks). For the available physiologies, run bugphyzz::physiologiesList()

Value

a large list of data.frames

Examples

x <- physiologies()

#> Finished animal pathogen
#> Finished antimicrobial resistance
#> Dropped 3054 rows with missing Attribute_value from antimicrobial sensitivity
#> Finished biofilm forming
#> Dropped 4 rows with missing Attribute_value from butyrate producing
#> Finished acetate producing
#> Finished lactate producing
#> Finished arrangement
#> Dropped 9304 rows with missing Attribute_value from shape
#> Finished COGEM pathogenicity rating
#> Finished mutation rate per site per generation
#> Finished mutation rates per site per year
#> Finished extreme environment
#> Finished gram stain
#> Finished growth medium
#> Finished growth temperature
#> Finished habitat
#> Finished optimal ph
#> Finished aerophilicity
#> Finished plant pathogenicity
#> Finished width
#> Dropped 1 rows with missing Attribute_value from spore shape
#> Finished isolation site
#> Finished disease association
#> Finished hydrogen gas producing
#> Finished length
#> Finished health associated
head(x[[1]])

#>   NCBI_ID Genome_ID Accession_ID                Taxon_name       Attribute
#> 1      11        NA           NA         Cellvibrio gilvus animal pathogen
#> 2      14        NA           NA Dictyoglomus thermophilum animal pathogen
#> 3      19        NA           NA   Pelobacter carbinolicus animal pathogen
#> 4      24        NA           NA   Shewanella putrefaciens animal pathogen
#> 5      34        NA           NA        Myxococcus xanthus animal pathogen
#> 6      41        NA           NA    Stigmatella aurantiaca animal pathogen
#>   Attribute_value      Attribute_source Evidence Confidence_interval    Rank
#> 1           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA             Unknown species
#> 2           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA             Unknown species
#> 3           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA             Unknown species
#> 4            TRUE The Microbe Directory       NA             Unknown species
#> 5           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA             Unknown species
#> 6           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA             Unknown species
#>      Parent_name Parent_NCBI_ID Parent_rank
#> 1   Cellulomonas           1707       genus
#> 2   Dictyoglomus             13       genus
#> 3 Syntrophotalea        2812025       genus
#> 4     Shewanella             22       genus
#> 5     Myxococcus             32       genus
#> 6    Stigmatella             40       genus

y <- physiologies(c("gram stain", "aerophilicity"))

#> Finished gram stain
#> Finished aerophilicity
head(y[[1]])
